games.title: The Division 2
games.description: The Division 2 is an online action role-playing video game developed by Massive Entertainment and published by Ubisoft.
games.details: The Division 2 is set in a near-future Washington, D.C. in the aftermath of a smallpox pandemic. The player, a member of the Strategic Homeland Division, is tasked with rebuilding the city.

games.title: Total War: Warhammer 3
games.description: Total War: Warhammer 3 is a turn-based strategy and real-time tactics video game developed by Creative Assembly and published by Sega.
games.details: Total War: Warhammer 3 takes place in Games Workshop's Warhammer Fantasy universe and is the third title in the Total War: Warhammer series. The game focuses on the battle between the mortal civilizations and the Chaos Gods.

games.title: Grand Theft Auto 6
games.description: Grand Theft Auto 6 is an upcoming action-adventure game developed by Rockstar Games. It is expected to be one of the most anticipated games of the decade.
games.details: Grand Theft Auto 6 is rumored to be set in Vice City and will feature an expansive open world with dynamic weather, real-time events, and more. Players can expect a gripping storyline and innovative gameplay mechanics.
